code.display: How many D per W did you engage in moderate to strenuous physical activity in the last 30D

item.text: How many D per W did you engage in moderate to strenuous physical activity in the last 30D

Moderate to strenuous physical activity includes walking fast, running, jogging, dancing, swimming, biking, or other activities that cause a light or heavy sweat. This term was reviewed and validated by Kaiser Permanente to be used to represent the Exercise Vital Sign (EVS).

code.display: On those days that you engage in moderate to strenuous exercise, how many minutes, on average, do you exercise?
